<HR STYLE="HEIGHT: 2PX; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="">
<A NAME="eolPage41"></A>
<DIV ID=PGHDR1876 STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P ID=PARA1876.2 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PX; MARGIN-TOP: 0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA1260 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV DATA-TD-STATEMENT-TYPE="NOTE">
<P ID=PARA1260 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	N
</B>
<B>
	ote
</B>
<B>
	11 &#8211; Legal Settlement
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA1261 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA1262 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	BreathableBaby, LLC (&#8220;BreathableBaby&#8221;) filed a complaint against the Company and CCIP on January 11, 2012 in the United States District Court for the District of Minnesota, which alleged that CCIP&#8217;s mesh crib liner infringed upon BreathableBaby&#8217;s patent rights relating to its air permeable infant bedding technology. On December 5, 2014, the Company reached a final settlement with BreathableBaby to resolve this matter under the terms of which the Company will be permitted to manufacture and sell a redesigned mesh crib liner product. In connection with the settlement, the Company made a one-time payment of $850,000 to BreathableBaby on December 11, 2014, which has been classified as legal expense in the consolidated statements of income for fiscal year 2015.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA1263 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<P ID=PARA1263 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA1264 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV DATA-TD-STATEMENT-TYPE="NOTE">
<P ID=PARA1264 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	N
</B>
<B>
	ote
</B>
<B>
	12
</B>
<B>
	&#8211; Commitments and Contingencies
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA1265 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA1266 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Total rent expense was $1.5 million and $1.4 million during fiscal years ended April 3, 2016 and March 29, 2015, respectively. The Company&#8217;s commitment for minimum guaranteed rental payments under its lease agreements as of April 3, 2016 is $5.4 million, consisting of $1.2 million due in fiscal year 2017, $1.3 million in each of fiscal years&nbsp;2018 and&nbsp;2019, $1.2 million in fiscal year 2020, and $342,000 in fiscal year 2021.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA1267 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA1268 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Total royalty expense was $9.0 million and $8.7 million for fiscal years 2016 and 2015, respectively. The Company&#8217;s commitment for minimum guaranteed royalty payments under its license agreements as of April 3, 2016 is $10.2 million, consisting of $5.2 million, $4.6 million and $427,000 due in fiscal years 2017, 2018 and 2019, respectively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA1269 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA1270 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Company is, from time to time, involved in various legal proceedings relating to claims arising in the ordinary course of its business. Neither the Company nor any of its subsidiaries is a party to any such legal proceeding the outcome of which, individually or in the aggregate, is expected to have a material adverse effect on the Company&#8217;s financial position, results of operations or cash flows.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA1271 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P ID=PARA1271 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
</P>
<P ID=PARA1272 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>

	E. Randall Chestnut, Chairman of the Board,&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">
	President &amp; Chief Executive Officer
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT">

<EFX_EXHIBIT_32>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_32"></A>
<P ID=PARA1 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<U>
<B>
	Exhibit 32.1
</B>
</U>
</P>
<P ID=PARA2 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<P ID=PARA3 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
	SECTION 1350 CERTIFICATION
</P>
<P ID=PARA4 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P ID=PARA6 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P ID=PARA7 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
	I, E. Randall Chestnut, Chairman of the Board, President and Chief Executive Officer of Crown Crafts, Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;), do hereby certify, in accordance with 18 U.S.C. &#167; 1350, as adopted pursuant to Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that, to my knowledge:
</P>
<P ID=PARA8 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB10 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 27PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA11 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
	1.
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA12 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
	The Annual Report on Form 10-K of the Company for the period ending April 3, 2016 (the &#8220;Periodic Report&#8221;) fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended; and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA13 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB15 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 27PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA16 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
	2.
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA17 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
	The information contained in the Periodic Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA18 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
	Dated:&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	June 9, 2016
</U>
	&nbsp;
</P>

<EFX_EXHIBIT_32>

<U>
<B>
	Exhibit 32.2
</B>
</U>

<P ID=PARA2 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
	&nbsp;

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_4"></A>
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
	SECTION 1350 CERTIFICATION
</P>
<P ID=PARA4 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P ID=PARA5 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P ID=PARA6 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P ID=PARA7 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
	I, Olivia W. Elliott, Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Crown Crafts, Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;), do hereby certify, in accordance with 18 U.S.C. &#167; 1350, as adopted pursuant to Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that, to my knowledge:
</P>
<P ID=PARA8 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB10 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 27PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA11 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
	1.
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA12 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
	The Annual Report on Form 10-K of the Company for the period ending April 3, 2016 (the &#8220;Periodic Report&#8221;) fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended; and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA13 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE ID=MTAB15 STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX" CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 27PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA16 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
	2.
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P ID=PARA17 STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
	The information contained in the Periodic Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ID=PARA18 STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
	&nbsp;

	June 9, 2016
